entry.tran: （供婴儿或幼儿在里面玩的）游戏围栏
entry.def: A playpen is a small structure which is designed for a baby or young child to play safely in. It has bars or a net round the sides and is open at the top.

means.word_mean: 1. a portable enclosure in which babies may be left to play

auth_sentence.content: In his vacuum-sealed playpen, Pee-wee disarms with his enthusiasm and his emptiness.
